days.text: Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 9 pm ~ 0 am due to astronomical tide. Fine, becoming cloudy. Force 4 to 5 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Temperature falling. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
